reviews.text:
Mother Restaurant is a hidden gem in North Finchley, London. It is an Iranian restaurant that offers authentic and delicious food. The restaurant has a traditional Iranian atmosphere, and the staff are very friendly and helpful.

I recently visited Mother Restaurant and was very impressed with the quality of the food. I ordered the Koobideh Kebab, which was cooked to perfection and was very juicy and flavorful. The rice was also delicious, and the salad was fresh and refreshing. I would highly recommend Mother Restaurant to anyone looking for a delicious and authentic Iranian dining experience.

I had an amazing experience. The food was absolutely delicious and authentic, bringing the flavors of Persia to life with every bite. The owner's warm hospitality added a personal touch to the evening, making me feel right at home. From the flavorful kebabs to the aromatic rice dishes, every item on the menu was a delightful journey for the taste buds. The ambiance was cozy and inviting, creating the perfect setting for a memorable meal. I can't wait to visit again and explore more of their exquisite offerings. Highly recommended for anyone looking for an exceptional Persian dining experience!

This is a lovely Persian restaurant set in the heart of Ballards Lane, Finchley. From when you open their doors you'll step into a very traditional Persian style atmosphere. The waiter greeted us very nicely and explained to us the dishes on the menu. The portions are quite generous compared to other local restaurants so order cautiously unless you've skipped lunch and tucking into dinner & quite hungry. We ordered humous, yogurts, bread, soup, meat platter, salad (not realising that they give you a gigantic bowl of salad as complimentary). It was all delicious. I expected the rice to be some what seasoned but it was just plain rice but they give you a big portion. The prices are very reasonable and a very friendly environment.

The salad is on the house. The portion was more than 4 people. The sauce on the salad was vinegar & walnut, worth to try it.
Starter: we ordered "mast-e-mousir" (it is kind of yogurt). Compared to other restaurants, it's bowl was significantly bigger! We had "Kashk-e-Bademjoon" containing walnut, onion, aubergine & kashk. It tasted delicious. However, bear in mind that you need to order bread separately for this dish.
Main: we ordered "Kebab makhsous". It tastes good. The tender fillet kebab tasted delicious. Also, we ordered "Shivid baghali ba mahiche". The mahicheh (shank) was a lot, one person can not definitely finish it. However, its taste was not good. I do not recommend it.
Dessert: we had faloude bastani which was good.

The staff were nice. Finding a parking may take some time. In overall, I recommend the place.
Authentic, delicious and generous portions. Salad with walnut sauce is on the house. Attentive and good service. If you are a fan of Persian street food this is your place.

address: 18 Ballards Ln, London N3 2BH, United Kingdom
